Attribute.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('SpringfieldZooEntrance')); if(!isNULL(object)) { var bonus = toString(Building::getArrangeBonus(object)); bonus = bonus+'%'; return bonus; } return ''

Attribute.name: progressPerc
Attribute.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('SpringfieldZooEntrance')); var bonus = round(((Building::getArrangeBonus(object))*100))/100; var max = 40; return bonus/max;

Attribute.name: progressPerc
Attribute.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('SpringfieldZooEntrance')); var bonus = round(((Building::getArrangeBonus(object))*100))/100; var max = 40; return bonus/max;
